reviews.review: It's CS!!!  If you don't like it then you are wrong!!!

Not much replayability, campaign almost impossible to beat, one character called me the n word and shot me in the head and he just disappeared from the mission never to be seen again. Almost no tangible story line and every time i boot up the campaign the characters voice lines change. Would not recommend this game whatsoever.
